context_bundle.summary: Session dump pattern for preserving agent context before compaction or session end. Creates verbose text file capturing: actions taken, doors loaded, decisions made, errors hit, solutions found. Enables knowledge extraction into new doors. Feedback loop for continuous improvement.

onboarding.quick_start: Before session ends or context compacts: 1) Summarize what was done. 2) List doors used. 3) Document decisions/reasoning. 4) Capture errors and fixes. 5) Write to ~/.phishri/sessions/{timestamp}.md
common_patterns: Trigger: End of session, context limit approaching, user request
Processing: Later convert valuable dumps to doors
known_errors: Dump too late: Context already lost
Too verbose: Include actionable info only
No processing: Dumps rot without door extraction

processing_flow: 6. Future sessions bootstrap with new knowledge
